description: Section to hold the parameters to be applied by default to each record in the nodes section

keyfile.description: Absolute path to keyfile on local machine to access the remote machine(s)

password.description: Password for SSH-access the remote machine(s)

username.description: Username for SSH-access the remote machine(s)

connection_port.description: Port for SSH-connection to remote machine(s)

connection_timeout.description: Timeout for SSH-connection to remote machine(s)

taints.description: Additional taints for node(s). Caution: Use at your own risk. It can cause unexpected behavior. No support is provided for consequences.

gateway.description: Gateway that should be used to connect to node(s)
